src_original: 'dzin pa'o/_/byang du 'bar ma dkar mo zhal bzhi phyag brgyad ma 'o ma dang chu dang sman dang chang dang /_bdud rtshi dang sha dang shing thog dang zan no/_/
mtshhams rnams su du ba ma nag mo dang /_dmig rgyu ma dmar mo dang /_mar
me ser mo dang /_mkha' gsal ma dkar mo rnams zhal bzhi phyag brgyad kyis
grub pa zhal gsum nag po dang dmar ba dang dkar ba'i zhal lo/_/phyag drug
gis ral gri dang gri gug dang rtshe gsum pa/_g.yon gyis phub dang thod pa dang kha tram kha 'dzin pa'o/_/lhor rin 'byung dmar po dkar ba dang nag pa'i zhal/

mngon par rtogs pa mu tig gi phreng ba zhes bya ba/ phyag drug gis me'i mda' dang lcags kyu dang cang te'u dang /_gzhu dang / zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/_/nub tu rnam snang ser po dkar ba dang nag pa'i zhal la/
phyag gis 'khor lo dang dbyug pa dang /_rdo rje 'dzin pa/_dung dang lcags
